plot: These Charming Men is a half-hour comedy series that surrounds the lives of three 20-something bachelors, Johnny, Tommy and Andy, as they struggle to achieve their dreams of becoming stars ...
title: These Charming Men
plot_es: These Charming Men is a half-hour comedy series that surrounds the lives of three 20-something bachelors, Johnny, Tommy and Andy, as they struggle to achieve their dreams of becoming stars ...
plot_en: These Charming Men is a half-hour comedy series that surrounds the lives of three 20-something bachelors, Johnny, Tommy and Andy, as they struggle to achieve their dreams of becoming stars ...
